qas.question: What does the IHDI specifically take into account?

context: The <a0_0>Inequality<a0_0/>-adjusted Human Development Index (IHDI) is a "measure of <a1_0>the <b3_0>average level<b3_0/><a1_0/> of human development of people in a society once <b2_0>inequality<b2_0/> is taken into account."
